name: Ensure that EC2 instance belongs to a VPC
description: Using the EC2-VPC platform for launching your EC2 instances instead of EC2-Classic can bring several advantages: Better networking infrastructure (network isolation, Elastic Network Interfaces, subnets) More flexible security controls (network ACLs, security groups outbound/egress filtering) Access to newer and powerful instance types (C4, M4, T2, etc) Capability to run instances on single-tenant hardware
